name: Kumrom
description:
Hi there, I'm AnArtDev and I made this game in 48 hours for the quad jam 2023. It's a fast paced speed running game that you can play for as long as you like.  Want more info? Be sure to check out my devlog!

I forgot to put a tutorial in the game so here it is:          Run fast! Try to discover all the rooms and return home as fast as possible!

Be expecting updates in the near future...
